Text: Cypress Acadian Exploration Corpyou are familiar with Cypress Acadian Exploration Corp an ENA subsidiary please contact Bob Carter at Ext Thank you

Request for NDA Cc John Pavetto asked if you could prepare a standard NDA for the following company Ajilon LLC Park Ten Place Suite Houston TX Attn Ken Keefer Ken Keefer is not sure who will sign on behalf of Ajilon David Berberian Managing Director will sign for Net Works John has a meeting with them the week of May Please let me know if you need any additional info Thanks Sheri

RE Request for NDA Cc John said to put the NDA on hold Well send another request if they decide to discuss anything further Thanks for your help sc Sheri L Cromwell Sr Administrative Assistant Enron Net Works Smith Street EB A Houston TX Phone Fax EMail Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday May PM To Cromwell Sheri L Subject Re Request for NDA Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on PM Tana Jones PM To Sheri L NRON cc Subject Re Request for NDA OLE Object StdOleLink Sheri I need to know the nature of the discussions we will be having with this company so I know how to word the decription in the agreement Also usually I email the agreements directly to the counterparty so unless he will be delivering this in another manner I will need an email address Sheri L nronXgate PM To Tana CT cc John nronXgate Subject Request for NDA Tana John Pavetto asked if you could prepare a standard NDA for the following company Ajilon LLC Park Ten Place Suite Houston TX Attn Ken Keefer Ken Keefer is not sure who will sign on behalf of Ajilon David Berberian Managing Director will sign for Net Works John has a meeting with them the week of May Please let me know if you need any additional info Thanks Sheri

IT Representative on Thursday Cc for the Windows roll out a representative from IT will be coming by on Thursday to look at the applications you are using on your computer As many of us utilize different databases and software we would like to get an accurate account of your PC in order to provide a smooth transition Please take a moment to visit with the IT representative and provide the necessary information Thank you
Databaseslet me know as soon as possible if you are experiencing any type of problems with the various databases that you use particularly Access databases Thanks sc

Copier in EB K Cc Kodak IS copier in EB K will be down for extensive service beginning Friday June th through Tuesday July th If you anticipate any large copy jobs please allow extra time for completion by the copy center downstairs The copier should be functional by Wednesday however it could take longer if they find that certain parts need to be replaced Sorry for the inconvenience but hopefully we will circumvent future service problems with this machine sc

Shower Remindera reminder that Leslie Hansens baby shower will be on Wednesday December th from in EBC Please let me know if you plan to attend so I can get an accurate count for lunch Thank you P S If you would like to contribute to a group gift certificate please let me know Sheri L Cromwell Sr Administrative Assistant Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB Houston Texas Phone Fax EMail

Gift Certificateyou would like to be included in the gift certificate for Leslies shower please let me know this afternoon I will be picking up a gift certificate from Doodles where she is registered late today Thanks Sheri

Baby Shower for Leslie Hansen Cc I understand from speaking with Genia that you have approved a baby shower for Leslie to be charged to your Cost Center number Leslie has chosen a tentative date of December th or possibly the th depending on conference room availability Linda and I just finished organizing Stacys shower at an approximate cost of breakdown as follows invitations plates tablecloths decorations cake lunch from Vespuccis Please let me know if this same estimate will be okay for Leslies shower Thanks Sheri

Utiliquest Destec QuantaHansen needs to identify a lawyer who worked on each of the following transactions in order to facilitate her review of content prepared by the Principal Investments group for publication on the web site Utiliquest LLC Destec Energy Inc Quanta Services Inc If you worked on any of these transactions please contact Leslie at Ext at your earliest convenience Thank you
